channel.title: HeavensSaga || Professional Development || Unique Content || Immerse world
channel.description:
[center]A new and unique adventure unlike any other. Journey into the immense world of heavens-saga. Defeat powerful enemies, make new friends. conquer everything you come into contact with. you'll never be without enjoyment with us!
Conquer powerful waves of enemy in survival dungeon!
Defeat boss's with friends and everyone gets rewards! with boss hunting feature.
Join today become part of something great![/center] [center] [url=https://heavens-saga.com][IMG]http://heavens-saga.com/files/play-now.gif[/img][/url] [URL=https://forums.heavens-saga.com][IMG]http://heavens-saga.com/files/ad.png[/img][/URL] [URL=https://heavens-saga.com][IMG]http://heavens-saga.com/files/play.png[/img][/URL] [/center]

item.title: HeavensSaga || Professional Development || Unique Content || Immerse world
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Nothing very interesting to be honest.

5m, 1k of every rune, 1k swordfish, among a bunch of other stuff just for logging in, plus shops for basically everything I could need to get through the first 70 levels in every combat skill within an hour. There is no reason to play this because there is no challenge. Plus the monster teleports are EXTREMELY unusual.

2/10. One of the two is because I didn’t get a virus for downloading it.

Read full topic
item.source: HeavensSaga || Professional Development || Unique Content || Immerse world

item.title: HeavensSaga || Professional Development || Unique Content || Immerse world
item.dc:creator: @RuneLife718 RuneLife718
item.description:
@RuneLife718 wrote:

Coldmedicine:

Looks nice.

Thanks mate.

Bug Fixes:

  1. player 1 opened a shop and it opened it for everyone else. Resolution: this has been fixed and shops work properly now.

  2. Survival dungeon death: when dieing it didn’t reset the minigame and you couldnt do anything. Resolution: death handler for this minigame has been written and is fully working now.

Will post more fix’s as I come across bugs.

Read full topic
item.source: HeavensSaga || Professional Development || Unique Content || Immerse world
